item.title: Quick Guide: R & SQLite
item.description: Connection con <- DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), ":memory:") Connection Summary summary(con) ## Length Class Mode ## 1 SQLiteConnection S4 List Tables dbListTables(con) ## [1] "ecom" "sqlite_stat1" "sqlite_stat4" List Fields DBI::dbListFields(con, "ecom") ## [1] "referrer" "device" "bouncers" "n_visit" "n_pages" "duration" Querying Data dbReadTable(): read entire table dbGetQuery(): read few rows dbSendQuery() & dbFetch(): read data in batches Entire Table DBI::dbReadTable(con, 'ecom') ## referrer device bouncers n_visit n_pages duration ## 1 google laptop true 10 1 693 ## 2 yahoo tablet true 9 1 459 ## 3 direct laptop true 0 1 996 ## 4 bing tablet false 3 18 468 ## 5 yahoo mobile true 9 1 955 ##
